notes: Also has racing simulator and pool tables
details_desc: Our golf simulators use the latest technology from Trackman specifically designed for indoor golf. The Trackman iO gives you the ultimate indoor golf experience. With over 300 courses to choose from and more being added every month, you’ll always have something new to try.

notes: Area to stretch with foam rollers and club washing station.
details_desc: Welcome to Uxbridge's first fully autonomous indoor golf facility.

notes: We’re golf enthusiasts who created the simulator experience we wanted. We were frustrated with the unnecessary hurdles golfers had to jump through to get into a simulator, and decided to remove the friction.
details_desc: Playing at a 6ix Iron Indoor Golf offers a unique and immersive experience, combining the thrill of golf with cutting-edge technology. The high-definition visuals and realistic physics make each swing feel authentic, while the climate-controlled environment ensures comfort regardless of the weather outside. The facility provides a perfect blend of fun, convenience, and precision, making it a favourite spot for golf enthusiasts of all levels

notes: Ace Track Golf is the premier indoor destination for golf enthusiasts in Aurora, Collingwood and surrounding areas.
details_desc: Our state-of-the-art facility combines cutting-edge technology with the passion for the game, offering an unrivalled high-tech golf simulator experience.

notes: Improve your swing, rain or shine – with Ancaster’s best golf simulator!
"Well organized, terrific indoor facility and good value."
details_desc: Welcome to AllSports Simulated. One of the first of its kind in Canada! Bringing together the industry leading golf simulation technology from FullSwing with Canada’s premiere sports simulation technology into one ultimate experience. You will not find more entertainment value for your dollar!

Anytime Golf offers golfers the chance to play anytime day or night, rain or shine, whenever the mood strikes. With remote access, you can enjoy the game you love 24/7, with a click of a button book a tee time and you're all set to go! We offer simulators with the newest, most advanced technology. Our simulators offer real time video feedback providing the best in accuracy and realism, paired with stunning new software with 4K graphics and ultimate realism our simulators take playing indoors to a whole new level.
